item.title: Concept Overview
item.author: Yuna Morgenstern
item.description: Concept: The 3D Cloud Development Tool for Companies Concept Overview: Code-Space is a cutting-edge 3D development tool designed specifically for companies utilizing Amazon Web Services ( Cloud). It provides a virtual environment where employees can collaborate, deploy real services, monitor performance, and enhance their skills. This immersive tool combines the functionalities of a 3D simulation game with the practicality of a development platform. Key Features: Customizable Environments: Companies can select scenes from a variety of options such as “Space,” “Desert,” " Underwater," and more.
